Verses: 1 yesuvaanavarekiristhu Endru Visuvaasikkira Evanum Dhevanaal Pirandhirukkiraan; Pirappiththavaridaththil Anbukoorugira Evanum Avaraal Pirappikkappattavanidaththilum Anbukoorugiraan.
2 naam Dhevanidaththil Anbukoorndhu Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollumbodhu, Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalidaththil Anbukoorugiromendru Arindhukollugirom.
3 naam Dhevanudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkolvadhe Avaridaththil Anbukooruvadhaam; Avarudaiya Karpanaigal Baaramaanavaigalumalla.
4 dhevanaal Pirappadhellaam Ulagaththai Jeyikkum; Nammudaiya Visuvaasame Ulagaththai Jeyikkira Jeyam.
5 yesuvaanavar Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Visuvaasikkiravaneyandri Ulagaththai Jeyikkiravan Yaar?

6 yesukiristhuvaagiya Ivare Jalaththinaalum Iraththaththinaalum Vandhavar; Jalaththinaale Maaththiramalla, Jalaththinaalum Iraththaththinaalum Vandhavar. Aaviyaanavar Saththiyamaagaiyaal, Aaviyaanavare Saatchikodukkiravar.
7 [paralogaththile Saatchiyidugiravargal Moovar, Pidhaa, Vaarththai, Parisuththa Aavienbavargale, Immoovarum Ondraayirukkiraargal;
8 poologaththile] Saatchiyidugiravaigal Moondru, Aavi, Jalam, Iraththamenbavaigale, Immoondrum Orumaippattirukkiradhu.
9 naam Manusharudaiya Saatchiyai Etrukkondaal, Adhaippaarkkilum Dhevanudaiya Saatchi Adhigamaayirukkiradhu; Dhevan Thamadhu Kumaaranaik Kuriththukkoduththa Saatchi Idhuve.

10 dhevanudaiya Kumaaranidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Andha Saatchiyaith Thanakkulle Kondirukkiraan; Dhevanai Visuvaasiyaadhavano, Dhevan Thammudaiya Kumaaranaik Kuriththukkoduththa Saatchiyai Visuvaasiyaadhadhinaal Avaraip Poiyaraakkugiraan.
11 dhevan Namakku Niththiya Jeevanaith Thandhirukkiraar, Andha Jeevan Avarudaiya Kumaaranil Irukkiradhenbadhe Andha Saatchiyaam.
12 kumaaranai Udaiyavan Jeevanai Udaiyavan, Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Illaadhavan Jeevan Illaadhavan.

13 ungalukku Niththiyajeevan Undendru Neengal Ariyavum, Dhevakumaaranudaiya Naamaththin Mel Neengal Visuvaasamaayirukkavum, Dhevakumaaranudaiya Naamaththin Mel Visuvaasamaayirukkira Ungalukku Ivaigalai Ezhudhiyirukkiren.
14 naam Edhaiyaagilum Avarudaiya Siththaththinpadikettaal, Avar Namakku Sevikodukkiraarenbadhe Avaraip Patri Naam Kondirukkira Dhairiyam.
15 naam Edhaik Kettaalum Avar Namakku Sevikodukkiraarendru Naam Arindhirundhomaanaal, Avaridaththil Naam Kettavaigalaip Petrukkondomendrum Arindhirukkirom.

16 maranaththukku Edhuvallaadha Paavaththaith Than Sagodharan Seyya Oruvan Kandaal, Avan Vendudhalseyyakkadavan, Appozhudhu Avanukku Jeevanaikkoduppaar; Yaarukkendraal, Maranaththukku Edhuvallaadha Paavaththai Seydhavargalukke; Maranaththukku Edhuvaana Paavamundu, Adhaikkuriththu Vendudhalseyya Naan Sollen.
17 aneedhiyellaam Paavandhaan; Endraalum Maranaththukku Edhuvallaadha Paavamumundu.
18 dhevanaal Pirandha Evanum Paavancheyyaanendru Arindhirukkirom; Dhevanaal Pirandhavan Thannaik Kaakkiraan, Pollaangan Avanaith Thodaan.
19 naam Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiromendrum, Ulagamuzhuvadhum Pollaanganukkul Kidakkiradhendrum Arindhirukkirom.

20 andriyum, Naam Saththiyamullavarai Arindhukolvadharku Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Vandhu Namakku Buththiyaith Thandhirukkiraarendrum Arivom; Avarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesukiristhu Ennappatta Saththiyamullavarukkullum Irukkirom; Ivare Meyyaana Dhevanum Niththiyajeevanumaayirukkiraar.
21 pillaigale, Neengal Vikkiragangalukku Vilagi, Ungalaik Kaaththukkolveergalaaga. Aamen.
